data.description:
Introduction

How News is Received

Bringing word of how people keep vanishing from **Insert City Name Here**. There is a Random - Dungeon Location - Necromancer Lab outside of town. Kids used to play out that direction, but about three years ago they started vanishing. Although preventing them from playing out that direction has helped some, some children and even an occasional adult still vanishes from time to time.

Necromancer

name: Linguistically Generated Name - Method - Plant

data.description:
Name

Linguistically Generated Name - Method

Appearance

The Linguistically Generated Name - Method is a Wilderness - Plant - Type It has Wilderness - Plant - Leaves

Fruit

The Linguistically Generated Name - Method Wilderness - Plant - Fruit - Size . The Wilderness - Plant - Fruit - Color fruit has a Wilderness - Plant - Fruit - Skin - Thickness Wilderness - Plant - Fruit - Skin - Texture skin filled with a Wilderness - Plant - Fruit - Filling - Texture Wilderness - Plant - Fruit - Color flesh with a Wilderness - Degree Wilderness - Plant - Fruit - Flavor taste and a Wilderness - Degree Wilderness - Plant - Fruit - Flavor aftertaste.

Traits

Eating all of the fruit of the Linguistically Generated Name - Method Wilderness - Plant - Fruit - Effect . Unless otherwise preserved, the fruit will spoil after Wilderness - Plant - Fruit - Spoilage (the more powerful the fruit the harder it is to preserve).
